Monitor module¶

Class for monitoring connection and status of drones.

class Monitor.DroneThread(threadID, drone, monitor)¶

Bases: threading.Thread

Thread to periodically check connection and status of a drone.

ifStopped()¶

Check if the thread is stopped.

run()¶

Start the thread. Check the connection, battery and status periodically with every DRONE_MONITOR_PERIOD second.

stop()¶

Stop the thread.

class Monitor.Monitor(manager)¶

Monitor to monitor threads of drones.

addDrone(assignedID, drone)¶

Add a new thread to monitor the drone.

handleDisconnection(threadID)¶

Tell manager to reconnect a disconnected drone.

handleLowBattery(threadID)¶

Tell manager to bring a drone back when battery is low.

releaseDrone(assignedID)¶

Release a drone from monitoring.

droneApiServer
